vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Simeon(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.37;
son of: Shiphi (H8230)
§ Ziza = "shining"
1) son of Shiphi, a chief of the Simeonites in the reign of Hezekiah
2) son of Rehoboam by Maachah the granddaughter of Absalom
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Sifi; tribu de Simeón; (b)   hijo de Roboam, rey de Judá
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
細撒 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "光亮的"
1) 示非的兒子, 希西家在位時的一個西緬人領袖 (代上1:37)
2) 羅波安跟瑪迦（押沙龍的孫女）所生的兒子 (代下11:20)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
细撒 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "光亮的"
1) 示非的儿子, 希西家在位时的一个西缅人领袖 (代上1:37)
2) 罗波安跟玛迦（押沙龙的孙女）所生的儿子 (代下11:20)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ch.11.20;
son of: Rehoboam (H7346) and Maacah (H4601K);
brother of: Abijah (H0029I), Attai (H6262I) and Shelomith (H8019);
half-brother of: Jeush (H3266K), Shemariah (H8114H) and Zaham (H2093)
§ Ziza = "shining"
1) son of Shiphi, a chief of the Simeonites in the reign of Hezekiah
2) son of Rehoboam by Maachah the granddaughter of Absalom
